stratml:PerformancePlanOrReport.stratml:Name: 2011 Annual Report
stratml:PerformancePlanOrReport.stratml:Description: This report covers the activities of the Strategy Markup Language (StratML) Committee during 2011. It is cumulative in the sense that it also documents results achieved previously. In addition, it begins to outline objectives to be pursued in the months and years ahead.
stratml:PerformancePlanOrReport.stratml:OtherInformation: Please let us know if you have proposed additions or corrections. Comments and suggestions with respect to prospective goals and objectives are also welcome, particularly if you would like to participate in specifying Part 3 and/or developing StratML tools, applications, and services.

stratml:Role.stratml:Description: ANSI-Accredited Standards Development Organization

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Co-Chair
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: With the completion and approval of Part 2 as an ANSI/AIIM standard, Adam deemed his work on the committee to have been completed and resigned his role as co-chair in 2011.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Leader of NIEM Task Group
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Sylvia is leading a task group to develop a NIEM implementation profile for StratML

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Developer of StratML Portal
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Andre is developing a StratML portal, including an XSLT form enabling the drafting and editing of StratML documents. (This report is being drafted and edited using his form.)

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Member of the NIEM Task Group
Schema Maintenance
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Art maintains the official copies of the schema while under development, prior to approval and publication at stratml.net.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Data Dictionary Producer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Art also automatically generates user-friendly data dictionaries (in MS Word format) from the StratML schemas.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Member of the NIEM Task Group
Member of the NIEM Task Group

stratml:Vision.stratml:Description: A worldwide web of intentions, stakeholders, and results.

stratml:Mission.stratml:Description: To specify an XML-based voluntary consensus standard for the information commonly contained in strategic and performance plans and reports.

stratml:Goal.stratml:Name: Strategic Plans
stratml:Goal.stratml:Description: Specify and foster usage of an XML standard for the information commonly contained in strategic plans.

stratml:Objective.stratml:Name: ANSI/AIIM Publication
stratml:Objective.stratml:Description: Publish Part 1, Strategic Plans, as an American (ANSI/AIIM) national standard.

stratml:ActualResult.stratml:Description: Part 1 was approved and published as ANSI/AIIM 21:2009.

stratml:Objective.stratml:Name: StratML Part 1 Files
stratml:Objective.stratml:Description: Convert strategic plans into StratML format to demonstrate and prove the elements of the standard.

stratml:ActualResult.stratml:Description: More than 800 plans have been converted to StratML Part 1 format, all of which are available at http://xml.gov/stratml/drybridge/index.htm. For the current number, see http://stratml.hyperbase.com/statistics.html, where other statistics are provided as well, including the number of goals, objectives, and stakeholders.

stratml:Objective.stratml:Name: Tools, Applications & Services
stratml:Objective.stratml:Description: Foster the development of tools, applications, and services supporting and leveraging the StratML standard for the benefit of various communities of interest.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: StratML Portal Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Cusson

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: XSLT Form Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Forms

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Schema Development Support
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Provided a schema development tools and expertise to support compilation of the schema for Part 1.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: XForms Form Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Forms

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Atom Demonstration Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Carmel

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: StratML File Converter
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Converted hundreds of StratML files to conform to the final version of the schema for StratML Part 1. http://xml.gov/stratml/drybridge/index.htm

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: StratML Tag Cloud Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Ari

stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#XMLSimplicity

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: StratML Search Service Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#MarkLogic

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: StratML Portal Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Available in Farsi and English. http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Pooyan

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: MS Word Quick Start Guide Drafter
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#ICTect

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: MS Word Quick Start Guide Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#ICTect

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: StratML Stylesheet Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Crane

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: StratML Developer Support
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#LiquidTechnologies

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Schema Central Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Datypic

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Strategic Plan Converter
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Converted a number of strategic plans to StratML format for inclusion in the prototypical collection compiled to demonstrate and prove that the elements of the schema capture the types of information commonly occurring in strategic plans.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Graphics Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Compiled a graphical depiction of the schema for Part 1.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: InfoPath Form Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Forms

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Strategic Plan Converter
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Converting strategic plans from non-standard, non-machine-readable formats, like PDF, into open, standard, machine-readable StratML format. http://xml.gov/stratml/drybridge/index.htm

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: StratML Search Service Provider
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Maintaining a Google site-specific search capability for the StratML collection at http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Google

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Glossary Schema & Stylesheet Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Compiled a schema and stylesheet for the StratML glossary.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Glossary Schema & Stylesheet Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Compiled a schema and stylesheet for the StratML glossary.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Schema Development Support
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/history.htm

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Stylesheet Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/history.htm

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Award Nominator
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Submitted StratML as a nominee for the President's Save Award program. http://xml.gov/stratml/history.htm

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Performance Plan/Report Task Group Member
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/history.htm

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Performance Plan/Report Task Group Member
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/history.htm

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Vocabulary & Schema Reviewer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: http://xml.gov/stratml/20080312Recklies.pdf

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Article Publisher
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Published an article referencing StratML in relation to the findability of information. See http://xml.gov/stratml/history.htm or, more specifically, http://www.takingaiim.com/2008/05/aiimqa-findab-1.html

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Business Case Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Served a highly active and key role in helping to compile the business case for StratML.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: CAM Interactive Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Developed a CAM interactive view of the schema for StratML Part 1. See http://xml.gov/stratml/history.htm and, more specifically, http://xml.gov/stratml/references/StratML-interactive.html

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: PDF Fillable Form Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Developed a PDF Fillable form for StratML Part 1. See http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Forms and, more specifically, http://xml.gov/stratml/forms/StrategicPlan.pdf

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Xopus Forms Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Developed an Xopus form for StratML Part 1, in English and Spanish. See http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Forms and, more specifically, http://xopus.com/Demo/stratml

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Spanish Translator
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Provided assistance in translating to Spanish the English labels in Xopus' form.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: XBRL Liaison
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Served as an expert liaison to the XBRL community.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Article Publisher
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Published an article on StratML. See http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#SeeAlso and, more specifically, http://www.examiner.com/technology-culture-in-washington-dc/owen-ambur-talks-about-the-work-of-the-stratml-committee

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Validation Service Provider
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Provided a validation service for StratML Part 1 files. See http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#NISTservice

stratml:TargetResult.stratml:Description: Development of prototypical tools, applications, and services.

stratml:ActualResult.stratml:Description: A couple dozen prototypical tools, applications, and services have been developed. They are documented and links are provided at http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Forms & http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Services.

stratml:Objective.stratml:Name: ISO Standard
stratml:Objective.stratml:Description: Obtain approval and publication of Part 1 as an international (ISO) voluntary consensus standard, for potential use by all organizations worldwide.

stratml:TargetResult.stratml:Description: Publication of Part 1 as an ISO standard.

stratml:ActualResult.stratml:Description: StratML Part 1 has been registered at ISO and assigned number ISO/NP 17469-1. Five nations -- Canada, South Africa, China, and Korea in addition to the U.S. -- have agreed to work on the international standard.

stratml:Goal.stratml:Name: Performance Plans and Reports
stratml:Goal.stratml:Description: Specify and foster usage of an XML standard extending Part 1 to include the additional information commonly contained in performance plans and reports.

stratml:Objective.stratml:Name: ANSI/AIIM Publication
stratml:Objective.stratml:Description: Publish Part 2, Performance Plans and Reports, as an American (ANSI/AIIM) national standard.

stratml:ActualResult.stratml:Description: Part 2 was approved and published as ANSI/AIIM 22:2011.

stratml:TargetResult.stratml:Description: Conduct regular teleconferences to receive input and discuss the additional elements to be included in Part 2.

stratml:ActualResult.stratml:Description: The StratML Committee conducted eight teleconferences on the following dates: January 5, March 22, August 24, September 22, October 6, October 20, November 3 and December 1.

stratml:Objective.stratml:Name: StratML Part 2 Files
stratml:Objective.stratml:Description: Convert performance plans and reports into StratML format to demonstrate and prove the elements of the standard.

stratml:ActualResult.stratml:Description: Thirteen performance plans and reports have been converted to StratML Part 2 format and are available at http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Part2.

stratml:Objective.stratml:Name: Tools, Applications & Services
stratml:Objective.stratml:Description: Foster the development of tools, applications, and services supporting and leveraging the StratML standard for the benefit of various communities of interest.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Portal Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Andre has developed a StratML portal for both Part 1 & Part 2 files.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: XSLT Form Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Andre has developed an XSLT form for both Part 1 & Part 2.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: InfoPath Form Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Owen has created InfoPath forms for Part 1 & Part 2.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: StratML Course Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Carlos is developing a training course for StratML.

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: StratML Query Service Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Matt is working on a JSON/MongoDB-based StratML indexing/browsing/query service. See http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Uberity and, more specifically, http://uberity.com/stratml/

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: StratML Query Service Developer
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Duane is working with Matt MacKenzie on a JSON/MongoDB-based StratML indexing/browsing/query service. See http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Uberity and, more specifically, http://uberity.com/stratml/

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Schema Development Tool Support
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: Ivan made available the enterprise edition of Stylus Studio to support development of the schema for StratML Part 3.

stratml:TargetResult.stratml:Description: Forms are readily available online for the creation and editing of StratML Part 2 files.

stratml:ActualResult.stratml:Description: An XSLT form and an InfoPath form are available.

stratml:Objective.stratml:Name: NIEM Implementation Profile
stratml:Objective.stratml:Description: Create an implementation profile for inclusion of StratML into a new Planning and Accountability domain in the National Information Exchange Model (NIEM).

stratml:TargetResult.stratml:Description: Creation of an implementation profile to support incorporation of the StratML standard into NIEM.

stratml:ActualResult.stratml:Description: Sylvia Webb is leading a task group developing the NIEM profile.

stratml:Goal.stratml:Name: Additional Elements
stratml:Goal.stratml:Description: Specify and foster usage of an XML standard extending Parts 1 and 2 to include the additional information deemed to be worthy of consideration for inclusion in strategic and performance plans and reports.

stratml:Objective.stratml:Name: GPRAMA
stratml:Objective.stratml:Description: Include additional elements required to more fully address data requirements implicit in the GPRA Modernization Act (GPRAMA).

stratml:Role.stratml:Name: Implementation
stratml:Role.stratml:Description: U.S. federal agencies are required by section 10 of the GPRAMA to publish their strategic and performance plans and reports in machine-readable format, like StratML.

stratml:TargetResult.stratml:Description: Incorporation of StratML into the Performance.gov site.

stratml:ActualResult.stratml:Description: Elements of the StratML standard have been documented in an entity relationship diagram depicting the elements of the Performance.gov site, as shown at http://xml.gov/stratml/omb/PDSERD20111206.pdf.

stratml:Objective.stratml:Name: Other Elements
stratml:Objective.stratml:Description: Incorporate elements for geospatial referencing, strategic planning frameworks, categorizations, relationships, and/or other purposes.

stratml:TargetResult.stratml:Description: Consensus on additional elements to be included, such as those listed at http://xml.gov/stratml/index.htm#Part3.
